      • fromJSON

        public static java.util.Set<org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack> fromJSON(JSONArray jsonItemSet)
        Generates an ItemSet from a JSONArray The JSON object should have the following format [{ "material": "MATERIAL_NAME", "amount": 1, "durability": 0, "name": "DISPLAY_NAME", "lore": "LORE" },... }]
        Parameters:
        jsonItemSet - An array of ItemStacks represented as JSON objects
        Returns:
        A set of parsed ItemStacks

        Parameters:
        inventory - The inventory to examen
        itemStacks - A set of ItemStacks that are requred to be in the inventoyr
        Returns:
        Checks if the ItemStacks are in the inventory
